David Saff wrote:

> The same capability
> existed in JUnit < 4.0: just google OrderedTestSuite.  As you point out,
> however, if a certain order is required in order to make a passing test
> fail, however, this is a good time to reconsider your testing strategy.

Please note that we built OrderedTestSuite purely as a way to migrate 
away from order-dependent tests. This is why we didn't just order the 
tests the JUnit 2 way: we wanted to specify "these are the tests that 
need to run in this order; for the rest, we don't care". The goal is to 
use OrderedTestSuite as a wedge, then make each test independent, moving 
them out of the OrderedTestSuite. I wrote about this in Recipes, chapter 
3 or 4 (I can't remember which).
